Population.value: ADULT. Safety and efficacy in patients with renal/hepatic failure not established. Although dosing adjustments are unlikely, it is recommended patient with abnormal liver function undergo continuous ECG monitoring beyond the usual 4 hour period seen with other patients.

AdditionalNotes.value: Supraventricular Tachyarrythmias in patients weighing 60 kg or more: if arrythmia does not erminate within 10 minutes after the end of the initial infusion, a second equal dose may be administered 10 minutes after completion of the initial dose. Recommended to administer 1 to 2.5 g magnesium sulfate intravenously prior to ibutilide dosing to prevent Torsades de Pointes VT. Ensure serum potassium is greater than 3.7 mmol/L.
